titles.title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on p-cresidinesulfonic acid.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 5/8/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on p-cresidinesulfonic acid.
